Plot: While filming an advertisement, some extreme sports enthusiasts unwittingly stop a group of terrorists.
Title: Extreme Ops
Writer: Timothy Scott Bogart (story), Mark Mullin (story), Michael Zaidan (screenplay)
Actors: Devon Sawa, Bridgette Wilson-Sampras, Rupert Graves, Rufus Sewell
tomatoConsensus: The various stunts in Extreme Ops don't compensate for the inane storyline and bad dialogue.
